episodes.title: 1 year ago I made a film about Scientology, here's what's happened since.
I Answered The Call From Scientology...Here’s the Mystery 👀
episodes.description:
#ThechurchofScientology called me yesterday and left me with a #mystery. what do you guys think? 


Thank you for all the new subscribers we hit 3000 today can't believe it! let me know what videos you would like to see next 🫶🚁 

I've made this video with the interest of protecting the public and the Prevention/ detection of crime or fraud.


For help leaving Scientology please visit https://theaftermathfoundation.org



To see my other Scientology videos you can check out this playlist 

Scientology Iceberg Explained
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLNpyq1BMZqyLL8yZ3KPt5RIEyjg4Lkrdf
 
#scientologycalled #kellicopter #scientologymystery #scientologytracking #scientologyrecovery #cos #scientologyfairgame

episodes.title: SCIENTOLOGY ICEBERG Part 5
episodes.description:
Scientology Iceberg Part 5

Welcome to part 5 of the Scientology Iceberg Explained series! In this episode we will be talking about David miscavige, the hole and more.

Disclaimer - information found for this series (excluding episode 1) has been sourced from ex-member testimony, documentaries, forums,blogs  and other websites of that nature. I am not in any way a journalist. I’m just showing what I found. 

Time Stamps: 


00:00 Intro 
00:27 - David Miscavige
03:45 - ABC news nightline Interview david Miscavige
08:00 - Is Scientology Rascist? 
09:29 - The Hole 
16:20 - Anderson Cooper - The wives of ex members
19:20 Escaping The Hole The Blow Drill 
21:47 - The Ranch 
23:26 - Wally Hanks (audio) 
27:18 The Vault 



If you haven’t seen part 1, 2,3 and 4 you can check them out here 

https://youtu.be/4hLHLmUa4qI Scientology Iceberg Explained Part 1 - My story The 6 year old SP 

https://youtu.be/Vvbe4WBrCWU Scientology Iceberg Explained part 2 - Celebrities Front groups and money 

https://youtu.be/qaV1q1Ga5bs Scientology Iceberg explained part 3 

https://youtu.be/XHMAWuQZECY part 4

David miscavige Interview abc news  https://youtu.be/exzmE3vW_Tw

Here are some great Youtubers to check out that have made videos about Scientology: 

https://youtube.com/channel/UCHgatVaw6PVNEDVmPRBl-kA Jen’s Story and experience growing up in the cadet org and Sea org. 


https://youtube.com/channel/UCD8AAvA3_JDFeOps-HzPPHg Aaron Smith Levin’s YouTube channel has tons of really informative videos about Scientology and what it’s like to grow up in the organisation. Plus you have got to meet his SP dog 😅

https://youtube.com/c/DazedbutNotConfuzed - Dazed but not confused - Personal experience and Interviews with ex members 
https://youtube.com/xenutv Mark Bunker - shows the harassment Fair game techniques used by scientologists 
https://youtube.com/channel/UCOTK4ae6wrPbRbYynM95mjA Tony Ortega - Journalist who has been reporting on Scientology for years 

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwZ2x35GrBCQBqFKAbDKjTunIH1aw7NEO Reckless Ben a YouTube Prankster joined the church of Scientology. It’s a funny series that also highlights their recruiting tactics and auditing process. 

Here are some other good resources to learn more about Scientology. 

https://tonyortega.org  - Tony has been reporting on Scientology for years and has loads of great articles

https://www.mikerindersblog.org Mike Rinder was a scientologist for 46 years and a high ranking member of the Sea Organisation, today he works to expose the truth about Scientology. 

https://scientologymoneyproject.com - A DEDICATED NEWS SITE INVESTIGATING SCIENTOLOGY MONEY, CRIME, LIES & LEGAL MATTERS

If you have been affected by Scientology I will leave some links below where you can get support.

Support links :

https://www.daretodoubt.org/scientology  helpful resources for members wishing to leave Scientology 

The Aftermath Foundation http://theaftermathfoundation.org  - Provides assistance for members that need help leaving Scientology 

Ex Sea Org Helpline ~ Founded by former Sea Org members, this site was built to help others leaving the Sea Org of Scientology reconnect with friends, find a place to stay, and get a job outside the church. Call 1-866-XSEAORG (1 866- 973-2674), and if you're in the UK, call 0208 864 4940

http://exscientologykids.com Read the stories of other kids who grew up in Scientology in their Voices in Unison project.

episodes.title: I took the Scientology Personality Test so you don’t have to.
episodes.description:
I took a Scientology personality test! Online…so you don’t have to. I filmed the results in case you are curious like me 😉 Please be aware that if you take this test they will be phoning you and they will be trying to sell you a course. I personally think these tests are quite degrading and I believe they could be dangerous if used to manipulate vulnerable people. 

I am currently editing episode 3 of the Scientology iceberg series  thank you for the support I have recieved!  if you haven’t see it yet you can watch part 1 and 2 here: 

https://youtu.be/4hLHLmUa4qI - Scientology Iceberg explained Part 1: My story. The 6 year old SP

https://youtu.be/Vvbe4WBrCWU - Scientology Iceberg explained Part 2: The Tip ( Celebrities front groups and money!) 

I grew up in Scientology, now we are taking a look at what this multi billion dollar organisation is really all about. I thought this needed it’s own moment. Many people take the test, for a joke, for fun or because they are seeking help. By all means if you want to do it. Go ahead but I thought it would be in the interest of the public to see an example of the results you might get. 

The aim of these tests are to get you to pay for books, courses and even DVD’s. Be aware and be careful ❤️

episodes.title: SCIENTOLOGY ICEBERG | TRAILER
episodes.description:
Coming soon! Scientology Iceberg Explained  is a video series I’ve been working on for the last few months. I grew up in Scientology and I want to share my experience with you all. 

After learning more about my own childhood in an attempt to heal and reconnect with family;  I fell down the Scientology rabbit hole and decided to put this iceberg series together. I went back to the church to ask some questions and have also  found so many stories from ex-members. If you are a current Scientologist then I welcome you to watch and see what I have learned. 

I would like to state that the intention of this series is to provide information about behaviour within the church of Scientology. It is not to question or judge anyone’s faith. 

The series will be out very soon but I wanted to let you guys know where I’ve been for the past 2 months. 

Please consider subscribing and hitting the notification bell so you can be informed when the series is released. 

I am nervous and excited to post this and I hope you will join me on this journey. 

*THE CHURCH OF SCIENTOLOGY DOES NOT ENDORSE THIS VIDEO* 


If you are looking for support in leaving Scientology I will leave some links below: 

Support links :

https://www.daretodoubt.org/scientology  helpful resources for members wishing to leave Scientology 

The Aftermath Foundation http://theaftermathfoundation.org  - Provides assistance for members that need help leaving Scientology 

Ex Sea Org Helpline ~ Founded by former Sea Org members, this site was built to help others leaving the Sea Org of Scientology reconnect with friends, find a place to stay, and get a job outside the church. Call 1-866-XSEAORG (1 866- 973-2674), and if you're in the UK, call 0208 864 4940

http://exscientologykids.com Read the stories of other kids who grew up in Scientology in their Voices in Unison project.



Video clips used in trailer: 

https://youtu.be/T_MEvWWljtQ homophobia in Scientology ( Growing up in Scientology from cradle to slave) 

https://youtu.be/emtjD_s6SHA David Miscavige launches the Scientology network 

 https://youtu.be/Y3kQe8P2gQY Daryl Hamel - interview with Scientology’s PR Pat Harney

 https://youtu.be/cSdiKShx1MM A conversation with a Scientologist

episodes.title: I grew up in Scientology, here's what happened…
episodes.description:
I grew up in Scientology here’s what happened. 

#growingupinscientology #ChurchofScientologystory #Storytime

 *THE CHURCH OF SCIENTOLOGY DOES NOT        ENDORSE THIS VIDEO* 

At the age of 6 the Church of Scientology informed my Parents I was an SP (Suppressive Person)  I needed to be handled or disconnected. This series will explore the Iceberg of Scientology. In this video I'll be detailing my experience with Scientology. Later we will discuss what I have learnt about this organisation and how deep this Iceberg goes… 

If we don't speak about these things then nothing can change. I hope this video can help someone who might be in a similar situation or someone who is thinking about leaving Scientology.

Thank you to my friends who have been so supportive of me and this whole process I couldn't do it without you and I love you lots 


If you want to support the channel you can do so by subscribing and commenting! 

Alternatively you can also buy me a coffee if you like! 

https://ko-fi.com/kellicopter



If you have been affected by Scientology I will leave some links below where you can get support.

Support links :

https://www.daretodoubt.org/scientology  helpful resources for members wishing to leave Scientology 

The Aftermath Foundation http://theaftermathfoundation.org  - Provides assistance for members that need help leaving Scientology

episodes.title: Leaving Scientology With The Man Who Made it Famous | Jeff Hawkins
episodes.description:
Today I am joined by the wonderful Jeff Hawkins who recounts his journey of leaving Scientology after creating an advertising campaign that put Scientology on the map. We discuss the abuse he suffered at the hands of David Miscavige  and how Jeff has approached recovery since leaving the Cult. 

You can buy Jeff's books here :

Counterfeit Dreams 
https://www.amazon.co.uk/Counterfeit-Dreams-Journey-Church-Scientology/dp/0615375642

Leaving Scientology 
https://www.amazon.co.uk/Leaving-Scientology-Practical-Escape-Recovery-ebook/dp/B0089SHGJI

Closing Minds 
https://www.amazon.co.uk/Closing-Minds-Scientologys-Technology-Control-ebook/dp/B00TQEJ8EU
